reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: FLC: Enhancing cold water aquaculture sustainability via transfer of Finnish water saving and environmentally friendly technologies
PYM: Kylmän veden kalanviljelyn kestävyyden tehostaminen suomalaisen vedensäästön ja ympäristöystävällisen teknologian viennillä

description.narrative: (Will be added in Finnish later)Objectives: 1) To ensure that the RAS system in RCCAS is technically completed and viable serving sufficiently the industry needs and operating as a pilot/training center. 2) To provide technology and knowledge transfer to p rivate farmers especially by training newly establish farms owned and run by ethnic minorities in water saving and RAS technologies. 3) To establish relationships with Finnish companies providing RAS technology design and consultancy??Expected Results:1) About 1 500000 ? 2 000000 locally adapted and produced eggs/fingerlings/breeders are made available and supplied for private farmers annually.?2) RAS technology and farm management is being demonstrated to farmers interested in and capable of applying RAS in their own firm. 3) Concept plans for 2-3 companied/ private farm are selected as target of the project in Vietnam. ?Activities:1) The reliability and safety of the pilot/ demonstration RAS system is increased. 2)?Workshops of RAS knowledge and technol ogy organized for private farmers. 3) Establishing/building relationships between local fish farmers and Finnish companies

Objectives: 1) To ensure that the RAS system in RCCAS is technically completed and viable serving sufficiently the industry needs and operating as a pilot/training center. 2) To provide technology and knowledge transfer to private farmers especially by tra ining newly establish farms owned and run by ethnic minorities in water saving and RAS technologies. 3) To establish relationships with Finnish companies providing RAS technology design and consultancy??Expected Results:1) About 1 500000 ? 2 000000 locally adapted and produced eggs/fingerlings/breeders are made available and supplied for private farmers annually.?2) RAS technology and farm management is being demonstrated to farmers interested in and capable of applying RAS in their own firm. 3) Concept pla ns for 2-3 companied/ private farm are selected as target of the project in Vietnam. ?Activities:1) The reliability and safety of the pilot/ demonstration RAS system is increased. 2)?Workshops of RAS knowledge and technology organized for private farmers. 3) Establishing/building relationships between local fish farmers and Finnish companies

tag.narrative: Generating jobs, livelihood opportunities and well-being in a developing country is the main prio rity area in this activity
Improving food security, access to water and sustainability is the secondary priority area in t his activity
